abstract: Designing accurate simulators for drivers to get acquainted with the newly built Buddh International Circuit was complicated by the track's numerous construction delays.
snippet: Designing accurate simulators for drivers to get acquainted with the newly built Buddh International Circuit was complicated by the track's numerous construction delays.
lead_paragraph: The Formula One series is racing in India for the first time this weekend. But long before teams arrived at the barely completed Buddh International Circuit on Thursday, they prepared for the grand prix, scheduled for Oct. 30, the same way they did for the first-ever Korean Grand Prix last year and the first-ever Abu Dhabi Grand Prix in 2009: They ran laps in the simulator.

headline.main: On Eve of Inaugural Formula One Indian GP, Teams Revved Up Their Simulators
